semantic_models.name: sm_calendar
semantic_models.description: Calendar dimension with multiple time breakdowns.

semantic_models.name: sm_location
semantic_models.description: Location dimension containing countries and regions.

dimensions.name: region
dimensions.description: Categorical dimension that groups countries into broader geographic regions for aggregated analysis.

semantic_models.name: fact
semantic_models.description: Base model for sales. Defines fundamental aggregations (measures).

metrics.name: sum_ty_sales_lm
metrics.description: Sums the sales for the last month of the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_sales_lm

metrics.name: sum_ly_sales_lm
metrics.description: Calculates the total sales for the last month of the previous year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_sales_lm

metrics.name: sum_ty_volume_lm
metrics.description: Sums the volume for the last month of the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_volume_lm

metrics.name: sum_ly_volume_lm
metrics.description: Calculates the total volume for the last month of the previous year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_volume_lm

metrics.name: sum_ty_sales_l3m
metrics.description: Sums the total sales for the last 3 months in the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_sales_l3m

metrics.name: sum_ly_sales_l3m
metrics.description: Calculates the total sales for the last three months of the previous year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_sales_l3m

metrics.name: sum_ty_volume_l3m
metrics.description: Sums the total volume for the last 3 months in the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_volume_l3m

metrics.name: sum_ly_volume_l3m
metrics.description: Calculates the total volume for the last three months of the previous year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_volume_l3m

metrics.name: sum_ty_sales_ytd
metrics.description: Calculates the total sales year to date for the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_sales_ytd

metrics.name: sum_ly_sales_ytd
metrics.description: Calculates the year-to-date sales for the last year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_sales_ytd

metrics.name: sum_ty_volume_ytd
metrics.description: Calculates the total volume year to date for the current year.
metrics.label: sum_ty_volume_ytd

metrics.name: sum_ly_volume_ytd
metrics.description: Calculates the year-to-date volume for the last year.
metrics.label: sum_ly_volume_ytd

metrics.name: sum_ty_sales_mat
metrics.description: Sums the current year sales for the moving annual total (MAT).
metrics.label: sum_ty_sales_mat

metrics.name: sum_ly_sales_mat
metrics.description: Sums the sales amount for the last year moving annual total.
metrics.label: sum_ly_sales_mat

metrics.name: sum_ty_volume_mat
metrics.description: Sums the current year's volume for the moving annual total.
metrics.label: sum_ty_volume_mat

metrics.name: sum_ly_volume_mat
metrics.description: Sums the volume amount for the last year moving annual total.
metrics.label: sum_ly_volume_mat
